snippet: If you’re a landlord who hasn’t redone a property in 60 years, Cullen Meyer is your kind of tenant.
abstract: Cullen Meyer, men's accessories designer and fashion trend forecaster, lives in an unrenovated apartment in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, that is an ode to the 1950s; by consulting old issues of Better Homes & Gardens, Meyer has made sure that every last detail fits the period, from linoleum rugs to a ruby-red microwave.
lead_paragraph: If you’re a landlord who hasn’t redone a property in 60 years, Cullen Meyer is your kind of tenant.

headline.seo: A Collector of ’50s Décor Finds an Apartment to Match
